00017 // Internal 
00018 struct Glyph {
00019     INT GetWidth() const { return m_width; }
00020     const UINT8 FONT_HUGE* GetData() const { return m_data; }
00021 
00022     INT m_width;                    // Character width in pixels
00023     const UINT8 FONT_HUGE* m_data;  // Pointer to the character bitmap
00024 };
00025 
00026 #define GlyphPtr Glyph FONT_HUGE* 
00027 
00028 // Internal 
00029 struct GlyphHeader {
00030     UINT16 m_offset;                // Offset of the bitmap-data
00031     UINT8 m_low_byte;               // Low-byte of unicode-character
00032     UINT8 m_width;                  // Width of the character
00033 };
00034 
00035 #define GlyphHeaderPtr GlyphHeader FONT_HUGE* 
00036 
00037 // The following definition allows a more readable forward-declaration for generated fonts
00038 #define GlyphTab struct { GlyphHeader* m_glyph_header; UINT8* m_data; }
00039 
00040 // Internal 
00041 struct GlyphIndexTab {
00042     UINT8 m_glyph_count[256];               // Number of glyphs - 1!
00043     const GlyphHeaderPtr m_glyph_tab[256];
00044 };
00045 
00046 #define GlyphIndexTabPtr GlyphIndexTab FONT_HUGE* 
00047 
00048 // Internal 
00049 struct FontRes {
00050     XYDIM height;
00051     XYDIM baseline;
00052     XYDIM gap_to_next_char;
00053     const GlyphIndexTabPtr normal_glyph_index_tab;
00054     const GlyphIndexTabPtr italic_glyph_index_tab;
00055     const GlyphIndexTabPtr bold_glyph_index_tab;
00056     const GlyphIndexTabPtr italic_bold_glyph_index_tab;
00057     const WCHAR* name;
00058     Glyph invalid_glyph;
00059 };
00060 
00063 class Font {
00064     public:
00068         enum SystemFontId {
00070             Client = 0,
00072             ActiveTitle,
00074             InactiveTitle,
00076             Softkeys,
00078             Menu,
00080             TextEditor,
00081             SystemFontIdCount   // mandatory last entry
00082         };
00083 
00085         Font();
00086 
00088         virtual ~Font();
00089 
00091         virtual const WCHAR* GetName() const = 0;
00092 
00095         virtual void GetGlyph(WCHAR chr, TextAttr text_attr, GlyphPtr glyph) const = 0;
00096 
00098         virtual INT GetHeight() const = 0;
00099 
00101         virtual INT GetBaseline() const = 0;
00102 
00104         virtual INT GetGapToNextChar(WCHAR character = 0) const = 0;
00105 
00108         virtual BOOLEAN SupportsTextAttr(TextAttr text_attr) const = 0;
00109 
00117         INT GetTextWidth(const WCHAR* text,
00118                          TextAttr text_attr,
00119                          INT from = 0,
00120                          INT n_chars = -1,
00121                          BOOLEAN include_gap = FALSE) const;
00122 
00123         BOOLEAN operator == (const Font& font) const;
00124 
00125         BOOLEAN operator != (const Font& font) const { return !(*this == font); }
00126 };
